page.title: 20Social Concerns in the Area
page.content: I would like Telscombe Cliffs to have more trees,ponds and wildlife. At the moment they are killing it by putting houses and shops most of which I do not like.They should have a lot more parks with ponds and trees. It would be nice to see more animals. By Fiona Young age 10 I wish there were more woodlands and wildlife reserves,more sports facilities,like gymnasiums,ice rinks so on and more playparks. By Nicola Green Aged 10. Lollypop ladies are needed especially near schools and the shopping centres. More paths would keep more people safe near the new housing developments. By Tracey Burt and Claire English a.9 I would Like some Local tennis courts and cricket pitches also a roller boot rink, and more clubs. By Johanna Freeman,Amy Grey. Aged.9
